arts.title: Painting
arts.artist: Leonardo da Vinci, Vincent van Gogh, Johannes Vermeer
arts.popular: Mona Lisa, Starry Night, Girl with a Pearl Earring.
arts.text: Painting is one of the most widely recognized and popular forms of art. It involves applying paint to a surface, such as canvas or paper, to create a visual image. Paintings can be created using a variety of materials, including oil, acrylic, watercolor, and pastels.
